snippet.title: Kindle Paperwhite for dummies
snippet.description: Kindle Paperwhite for dummies . \- 2nd ed. / Nicoll, Leslie H Get the inside story on the all-new Kindle Paperwhite with help from For Dummies It reads like a book, but it's so much more [...] Hoboken, NJ : Wiley, 2014. - 210 p.

snippet.title: Cybersafe : protecting and empowering kids in the digital world of texting, gaming, and social media
snippet.description: Cybersafe : protecting and empowering kids in the digital world of texting, gaming, and social media / O'Keeffe, Gwenn Schurgin Children today are growing up in a world far different from the one in which their parents were raised [...] New York, NY : American Academy of Pediatrics, 2010. - 362 p.

snippet.title: Don’t put your family at risk Ne mettez pas votre famille en danger
snippet.description: Don’t put your family at risk Ne mettez pas votre famille en danger / Computer Security Team How easy is it to fall into the trap of cyber-criminals? Get one’s online banking password stolen? Lose photos to third parties? It's easier than you think. One single click to open a malicious attachment or a malicious web page is sufficient to put your family at risk. [...] BUL-NA-2013-058.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 12/2013 13/2013 14/2013
